item.description:
Connecting with Experience ~ 10 am - 12:30 pm Nagaloka's special guest, Satyada, an Order Member from Aryaloka, will lead us through a wonderful teaching from the Udana. The Udana is a Buddhist scripture, part of the Pali Canon of Theravada Buddhism.

Senses, friend or foe? We will explore what role our senses play in connecting with experience in light of the advice given by the Buddha to Bahiya (Udana 1.10).

All welcome ~ suggested donation $20.
item.name: Connecting with Experience at Nagaloka
